description:
Ice climbers have been counting on BD screws for years. They've undergone some tweakage over time for fast placements and quick change-overs. The shaft is turbo tapered, and teeth are deep to offer a quick, solid bite.

  • Made of chromoly steel with stainless steel hangers that are light, won't rust, and help prevent melt out on sunny routes
  • Tooth geometry is designed to bite easily
  • Large crank knob for a fast placements and uninterrupted 360-degree motion
  • Second clip-in point makes swapping positions at belays more efficient
  • CE certified
  • Available in 10, 13, 16, 19, and 22cm lengths, colour coded for quick indexing
name: Black Diamond Express Ice Screw
